Name: Interstellar Expeditions
Description: Interstellar Expeditions is a group of archaeologists, historians and anthropologists founded by the idle wealthy to investigate unsolved mysteries of the galaxy. While their scientific work is mostly respected, IE has found itself in the middle of several controversial incidents, with some of its members accused of being 'mercenary archeologists' due to their engagement in blatant treasure hunting.
ReputationStatements: We need to hire a reasonable mercenary company to protect our expeditions in this area.

MissionSuccessStatements: My superiors at Interstellar Expeditions will be satisfied with the successful completion of this operation.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: That was unexpected but then it is our field to look for strangeness throughout the galaxy.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Commander, I certainly wasn't expecting such a weird failure on your part.
